kana: のうぎょうのきぎょう
example: Agricultural corporations used advanced technology to grow cash crops.
Sugarcane is an important export used to make bioethanol.
South American countries have a lot of minerals such as bauxite.
There are many problems because of big farms and mining.
Many people are worried about environmental problems.
Corporations make large cattle farms by cutting down the forest.
Traditional farmers use old methods to grow potatoes and corn.
If the rainforests disappear, they will never return.
The world is worried about the loss of the tropical forest.
Once the trees are gone, it is very difficult to grow them again.
